Hello  im applying for citi rewards credit card. For the welcome bonus  what counts towards the qualifying spend? Does pairing it with Amaze and spending on food ect. counts?Sorry im quite lost about this
Yes.Usually check their tnc. Not excluded meaning it will count towards min spend

Yes food can  generally all retail spending can.If insurance  bill payment  utilities and public transport then cannot. Those can be found in the TnC excluded list for the rewards and also for the card.
